duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee daily workflow to ensure service standards are met and staff consistently follow standard job expectations and regulatory requirements.
Coordinate work assignments and oversee monthly schedule.
Serve as a resource to staff for issues surrounding instrumentation and sterilization.
Collaborate with management to develop and implement policies, procedures, and business work plans for the department.
Provide leadership and supervisory guidance in quality improvement efforts.
Maintain and report required regulatory records and quality assurance reports.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred
Certification from IAHCSMM, CBSPD, or other nationally recognized certifying body required
